block.name: RDS Rate Enforcer
block.doc:
This block enforces the RDS data rate of 1187.5bps
Input "Data" is an RDS bitstream (1 sample per symbol); Input "Clock" is a 19kHz sampled at the desired sampling rate. The output runs at the Clock's sampling rate carrying the same RDS bitstream ("Data") with a data rate of 1187.5bps.
This is done by pushing the next RDS bit after 32 zero-crossings in the clock.
